com.gussssy.gametwo.game

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gussssy.gametwo.engine.AbstractGame
      • com.gussssy.gametwo.game.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends AbstractGame
    GameManager. Program entry point. Initialises the Game. Responsible for updating and rendering the GameObjects, level and various other game components each frame.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(GameContainer gc,
                   float dt)
        GameManager update. Call update on the GameObjects, the level, HUD, Physics, log, camera and debug panel.
        Specified by:
        update in class AbstractGame
        Parameters:
        gc - the GameContainer.
        dt - the time passed since last update

      • getLevelTileCollision

        public boolean getLevelTileCollision(int tileX,
                                     int tileY)
        Determines if the tile located at (input) x and (input) y coords will collide with a game object
        Parameters:
        tileX - x location of the tile to be checked for collision
        tileY - y location of the tile to be checked for collision
        Returns:
        wether or not the specified tile is solid or not and therefore if it collides

      • getLevelTile

        public LevelTile getLevelTile(int tileX,
                              int tileY)
        Returns the specified level tile. However if the tile does not exist returns null. BEWARE
        Parameters:
        tileX - x location of the tile
        tileY - y location of the tile
        Returns:
        the tile specified by tileX and tileY parameters

      • addObject

        public void addObject(GameObject obj)
        Adds a GameObject to the objects list so it is updated and rendered each frame
        Parameters:
        obj - the GameObject to add to the objects list

      • getObject

        public GameObject getObject(java.lang.String tag)
        Gets a GameObject from the list of currently active game objects
        Parameters:
        the - tag of the desired GameObject
        Returns:
        the first GameObject from the objects list that has a matching tag

      • render

        public void render(GameContainer gc,
                   Renderer r)
        Renders the game. Calls Render on: - the currently loaded level - all GameObjects - HUD - Tab Menu / inventory - Debug display - Renders text containing basic player position/state varibales etc - Renders Debug Messages 1-12 - Renders the cursor (last so nbothing if drawn on top of it.)
        Specified by:
        render in class AbstractGame
        Parameters:
        gc - The GameContainer, used to access the Input class to check for Keyboard input.
        r - The renderer

      • setAllTilesAccessible

        public void setAllTilesAccessible(boolean accessible)
        Sets all the level tiles accessibility to true or false The accessible field of LevelTile is used for NPC pathfinding. When a tile accessible is set to false, an NPC wont try and path to it.
        Parameters:
        accessible, - wether all level tiles are to be set to accessible or not accessible

      • setAllTilesVisited

        public void setAllTilesVisited(boolean visited)
        Sets all the level tiles visited field to true or false The visited field of LevelTile is used for NPC pathfinding. When a tiles visible field is set to true, pathfinding will not revist this tile.
        Parameters:
        accessible, - wether all level tiles are to be set to accessible or not accessible

      • setLevelTiles

        public void setLevelTiles(LevelTile[] levelTiles)
